Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
Just ordered two 25 euros burger, medium,  and both came with the bun burned and very rare. I don't need to mention the taste.
This things can happen. But I am writing this because the person in charge felt ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The best meet and so well prepared. I love it. The people are nice and good service.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Great service. They're all very nice. We had a great time. Delicious meat.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Very nice staff and excellent food. The rib eye, tenderloin and grilled vegetables were on point. We also ordered parfait for desert and it was amazing .

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Restaurant in one of the best areas , great service. The Meat and carpaccio were great ! Really Recommend !

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: We were met with a friendly and incredibly accommodating member of the team at our entrance. My brother is on a strict keto diet and sometimes it's not easy to get a meal for him just right. These guys blew us away, absolutely no problem ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: It took more than 1 hour for them to serve the meat, which was pretty mediocre at best. Nothing other than the ambiance and dessert was high quality. All in all, very highly priced restaurant with below average food and service, there are certainly way better places to have meat in Amsterdam

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Nice restaurant, great service, average steak. Meat had a lot sinew, was tough and bland.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The best meat in Amsterdam. Thank you Jessica for the Amazing service I totally recommend it

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
Excellent meat - the 28 day aged Chateaubriand tenderloin melts in your mouth. Also the side dishes are good, and of course the drinks.
Friendly and knowledgable service who understand that customers don‚Äôt always ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: We found this place on our way to the museums and it was a pleasant surprise. The picanha was perfectly cooked: tender and with great flavor

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Meat selection is great and very fresh and tasty we ordered our meat medium rare and it was prepared accordingly. Wine card is more than decent for a pub type of place but they didn't have appropriate glasses for red wine. Staff is nice and helpful and prices are a bit more than average but still ok for the area.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
Good sized servings, great value for money.
Had a vegetarian burger option also.
Meat was slightly overcooked.(per their description), which didn't bother me ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
Excellent food!
They certainly know how to cook their meat. Our steaks were delicious. I like my steak rare but the waiter recommended to have it medium and I was not ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Great food. Great cuts of meat and fresh. Try the Philly Cheese steak. Love the spin on it that they have and how you actually are asked what temp you want your steak at....not like some places where it's all just well done and dry. A must try if you are in Beautiful Amsterdam.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Good meat, good wine selection (Spanish and Chilean ...) And good local cheese (and yes I'm French ...). I was not expecting this nice surprise. I could not get a table So i ate at the bar. Very nice service by the friendly personnel (and the boss and his gf). Excellent address. Not cheap ... But great  quality! üëç

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The Uptown Meat Club is a traditional meetrestaurant where you can eat dry aged really good meet. The best meet and so well prepared. I love it. The people are nice and good service. Also great wines. I will come back soon to enjoy !!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
Politely kicked out!

Decided to go here to have a few drinks at the bar and potentially something to ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: A very trendy place that serves very good quality meat. Anything from steak to veal are cooked exactly as ordered. Their cocktails are definitely under-rated. The White Russian I ordered came with a shot of espresso, and that combination ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Hands down the best food we had in Amsterdam. Even a simple grilled vegetable dish was flavorful. We had the Caesar salad, steak sandwich with grilled vegetables and mushrooms on the side. Everything was delicious. Service was excellent as well!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Perfectly cooked lamb chops, great beef carpaccio and nice beef tartare! Great quality and flavors. This was our last lunch in Amsterdam and we really enjoyed it. Thank you!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
The atmosphere and staff are nice.

The food was quite bad though, actually I have never seen such bad quality meat ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Went to this place only by luck as was struggling to find places to eat in the area and honestly it was such a food decision. I purchased the 'Philly cheese steak sandwich' which was absolutely delicious. I wish the description for this ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Great place to eat.We had lunch there, a dutch beef terderloin middle point of cooking which was delicious and a very tasty burger.As side order, a green salad with a homemade sauce which was perfect for the meat. Recommend 100%.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Best place to have meat in Amsterdam. They know how to cook perfectly. Good for kids meal too. Great staff and service

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Walked in on 14/2... manage to get a table as someone cancelled ! Good food, delicious wine and dessert is a must !

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Excellent meal, reasonably priced in great neighborhood. Good service, great quality meats and good wine selection by the glass.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The tenderloin was so delicious, lekker, delicioso.! üëåüèΩ

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: A lovely little diner near the PC hooftstraat. Cozy, lovely relaxing music, the waiters are kind and willing to go the extra mile. The food was really good and I thoroughly enjoyed it. Definitely a place to consider for dinner.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
The food was great.
The restaurant has a nice location and the staff was polite.
Would recommend.
Only drawback was the short menu.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Price is quite high, but the meat is of good quality. Customer service is very friendly. Portions are okay.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Great service, terrible food. The staff was very friendly and helpful; they earn a 5-star rating. The food on the other hand...terrible. We ordered rib-eyes. What we got was a tough, chewy cut of meat that was a poor excuse for steak. Very ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The meat was beautifully cooked to perfection and served with delicious and flavourful sides such as the fries and grilled veggies. Outstanding service and a cosy atmosphere.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Nothing spectacular, wouldn‚Äôt repeat

Review Text: Good burgers, good location, good service. I ordered the Spicy burger (medium cooked).. Couldn't have asked for a better burger that day

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Very good meat, very tender and juicy and good flavor. The vegetables were very nice too. Also Lukas was very nice  ;)

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Great food, very friendly and helpful staff. A relaxing and pleasant atmosphere, they make you feel at home. I will be back very gladly.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Lovely people and food, thank you for a great lunch!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: We waited for half an hour to get the order and another half an hour for the food. The food isn‚Äôt even good after that much time of the wait, let alone the small portion that can only feed birds. ‚Ä¶

Review Text:
Great food. Ribeye just melted in my mouth - impossible not to eat everything, including the fat.

Review Text: Possibly one of the best steaks I've ever had.  Also has a great atmosphere.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The restaurant policy of no tap water, even though I ordered a 30 euro steak is just outrageous.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Yummy! Warm and casual environment

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Was a great evening at this place. We had a tomahawk and it was amazing. Stayed for a weekend in a hotel close to the restaurant. That‚Äôs why I came 2 times in 3 days :) I liked it a lot...

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: I've been to this place several times and every time - the food, the service and everything else surrounding me has been amazing. I've tried the steaks and the burger there and I can say that I haven't tried better ones in Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Steak was perfect. Professional and welcoming staff. Rate it 10/10.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Expensive for what you get and not the best meat I've eaten.. Due to allergies I asked for another side salad but that wasn't possible so I had to order it another one and pay extra. Not the best customer service if you ask me.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The T-bone steak was cooked as ordered. Very tasty . You need 2 or 3 people to eat the whole thing.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: That was my luckiest hit ever: great vibe, popular but not touristy, food was great quality and the staff were super friendly!!! I'm so visiting again!.thank you guys!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Really nice food, decent wine. We especially liked the chocolate chip cookie baked in a tiny cast iron skillet with vanilla ice cream. It was even OK for our 6 year-old, though it has an upscale feel. I felt the price was fine relative to what you get.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The spareribs were amazing! I thought I didn't like spareribs, turns out I never had any good ones. And these were very good!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Olives were great! The meat and grilled vegetables were even better!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: They play really good music. It was quiet and cosy and the food was amazing!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Atmosphere food and service were all great. We were actually trying to go to The Seafood Bar next door but there was too long a wait. Glad we were able to get into Uptown. The downstairs looks like  a great place to host a party. The only ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Ordered the Tenderloin / Ossenhaas [250gr] medium rare for takeaway with chimchurri and it was delicious. Perfectly cooked. Oven heating is also possible, just do it at 160degrees for around 7-8 minutes!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
Tourist trap. Overpriced, cold food and poor service.

Steak came out cold as did the asparagus, sent then both back and the other side ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Delicious! Beautiful steaks, big portions and very tasty sides. The spring chicken was not over cooked and full of flavor. Amazing wine pairings too. Not overpriced considering it‚Äôs right by the museums!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Went to this when we were struggling to find other options around.  Not a whole lot of options in the menu overall, but they definitely knew how to prepare their food as it was good.  I had the chicken, which was really small, but it was cooked very nicely and good spice flavoring.  Neat interior design, and glad I've visited it.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Always great! My favorite UBER eats in Amsterdam. Really good steaks. And I love their steak tartare. Caesar salad is good too! I can‚Äôt eat gluten so there‚Äôs a limited number of places I can eat and this is my favorite.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Nice promising looking place and staff... but the burger ... Average ... nothing special, the meat was over spiced and not medium as I‚Äôd request, just well cooked all through, very salted and lacked the fresh juicy vibe I‚Äôd expect for this price and location... but it was ok... and maybe if you eat in it would be different .

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Good meat, enjoyed our lunch. Great burgers. Only negative - steak while very good, the portions were small so check size before you order and service was just ok... (Forgot my beer).

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The staff was warm and engaging while the food was terrific! The beef was cooked to perfection and aged beautiful--melted in my mouth--while the bernaise sauce heightened the experience. When I travel, I rarely go back to the same ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: MY NEW FAVORITE RESTAURANT IN AMSTERDAM! Never tasted a meat like this in such a lovely cozy and warm environment. I am so glad I walked by with my girlfriend and decided to stop, attracted by the warm welcoming attitude of the staff and ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
Nice place but I won't be back.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
Probably the worse meat I've ever been served. Tasteless ribs and so was the steak. Very chewy and extremely fatty! Highly disappointed.
The staff were okay but didn't offer a discount when I told them about are food, ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Good cut of meat, nice interiors... Way too expensive and pretentious for what it was. We were served with a lot of flair for some slightly fancy pub food. My "sandwich" was a mediocre salad on top of a piece of toasted bread. An open-faced salad on a bread pedestal. Meh. Touristy area, so over-priced for nothing special.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Yummy food on Uber Eats! Good 2 for one deals on burgers and the bavette with potatoes is delicious too! The cute note written on the side of the bag for repeat customers is very nice, thanks for the good service and quick delivery during covid-19 restaurant lockdown!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Amazing food ‚Äì we shared all the specials, plus some sides, amongst three people. Porterhouse was absolutely impressive, but the Tomahawk and everything else was great, too. Make sure to ask for daily/weekly specials! One small criticism: ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Fairly expensive for the amount of food. However the meat is excellent, and their burgers are absolutely fantastic. Service was nothing exceptional but the venue is very nicely organized and spacious. Will definitely come again, and is a good pit stop for any meat lover !

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Very happy with our meal. We chose the three course special which was excellent value - your choice of two selections from each of the starter, main and dessert menus. The wine was also very nice. A good place for anyone staying in the museum quarter of Amsterdam.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: All of burger's we ordered have Been not teasty, prepared  as well done but we ordered IT as medium done or raw. The quality od meet is questionable.  French fries burned, the same roasted potato.. look for something else, we do not recommended this place.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: five Star for this Place in my opinion are not enough. in front of the park the most important Park in Amsterdam, there is this Nice restaurant very delicious  with Good people. In fact the owner of this place is a couple of Young guys. I like the loft the meat and my friends loveed the hamburger

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Very nice and quiet place. A large choice of different meats obviously but you can also take a vegan burger or a tuna steak, for instance. I didn't try but the wine menu looks nice. Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Over all it's great but it's quite pricy fir a burger place. The special burger + draft beer was 12.50‚Ç¨, which is fair but it only came with one simply burger without anything else. Maybe I had too high expectation. Don't get me wrong, he ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Very good meat, nice seating and atmosphere accompanied by live music on this rainy Friday eve. Was a perfect little escapism in this rather peculiar period. Highly recommended!üëåüèº

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
I enjoyed the service, the recommendation. We tried Picanha 600gr. Easily served 3 people and the mix of sweet potatoes with asparagus, butter was super good.
Beers also nice.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Lovely meat, nice staff (they showed me around the kitchen). Nice atmosphere as well. I love to eat a good steak and this one was definitely a 9 out of 10.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Decent burgers, deceitful lunch deal. Appreciating the margin perspective, the bacon and cheese cost ‚Ç¨1 on top of, and fries as well. I had a bavette there once that was like rubber and I still remember so avoid that, despite the name of the place

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: I went here with a group of friends and some of us ordered mixed grill skewer dish which you were supposed to get beef, chicken and sausages. and we got only 1 smallish skewer in a big wooden board which made the board look so empty. For ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Lovely food and vibe, the picanha was delicious! Also recommend the mac and cheese with truffle.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Delicious food, slow service

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: We ordered from Thuisbezorgd. The food was super delicious and as they had no spareribs, they upgraded us to the c√¥te de b≈ìuf instead, without extra costs! Great service, I will definitely order again.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The food is very nice, and it‚Äôs for a fair price. We didn‚Äôt have to wait too long before we got the food either. It took a while before we got the drinks because the waiter forgot it, but it was an honest mistake, so I give them 5/5 stars.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Super quality meat and good prices

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: My girlfriend says the food was decent but I think we both have been spoiled by the steak places in London so I personally found the fries were the highlight of the meal the steak was only ok (I didn't think it was seared properly) for the price it charges you would expect a slightly higher standard. Service was good though

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
Coming from my South Africa I can genuinely say that my meat was delicious.
The service was gracious, I loved the atmosphere and would recommend the restaurant wholeheartedly. ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: I was eating with a Chinese friend of mine and it was pretty cold there. The ambience was very sterile anyway. Service was ok but not great, wine was not poured in glasses, some of the menu was not available for the last few days. Would not come again

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: One of the best hamburgers my wife and I have had. Food was excellent. Service was excellent. Good location and good prices. Can't recommend highly enough.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The best meat in Amsterdam! Excellent service, wines and ambiance at a fair price.  Lunch and dinner restaurant with a Parisien atmosphere and Argentinian meat quality

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Rushed in,without a reservation, from the pouring rain.  Nice welcome and we were quickly found two seats at the window bar looking out at the street.  Very quick service which was brilliant as we had a concert in an hour to go to.  Menu ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Really high quality food, twas a nice place - you get what you pay for so to say. Nice waitress as well. ‚Ä¶

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Amazing food and very kind staff.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Good cozy place near the Vondelpark to have a good meaty dinner with a good atmosphere

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Maybe I'm crazy? But tap water should be free. It's insane that they can't just give me water or of their faucets. Then the burgers were just mediocre at best. Poor service as well. 2 girls next to us waited 20 minutes for anyone to take their order.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text:
great place, we enjoyed it a lot - the food, the delicios meet, the wine.
stuff was friendly and even sent us a cheese platter on the house!
we will definitely return!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: A special smokey burger to look forward to! Simply the best I have ever had üôÇ

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Great food! And a great atmosphere! I had a burger and it was amazing. Definitely suggest this place if it's along your path.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Fantastic tasting food. Service was slow however and it is expensive compared to similar restaurants. It your willing to wait and pay the price you will have a great time.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Best meat in town! The bavette is juicy and cooked to perfection. Good portion for side orders. It's a bit on the expensive side but money well spent

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Nice little place and friendly staff but it's infested with small flies. I only went for a couple of beers and sat outside but when I went to the bar there were swarms of them. The bar staff said they were dealing with them but no way I would eat there.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Steak was absolutely amazing and the staff was friendly. I would highly recommend this place if you are looking for quality food combined with a great atmosphere.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: More for tourists who show up only once. Is ok if u want just get a drink during your shopping but dont count on a quick service. Staff are nice but majority inexperienced. Location is central but noting special.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: We went for dinner. The meat and chips were perfect, the wine too. The service was not so good. Probably this is why the place wasn‚Äôt full.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Very nice place. Definitely would suggest as the best option to have a good meal - good price, high quality meat and amazingly nice staff.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Steaks were very good, cooked just right.  "Salad" on the side left something to be desired.  Service was prompt.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Wonderful place! Service with a smile, great cuts of meat- we had a great time!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Amazing atmosphere and amazing staff working there ü§© had an amazing time there on Friday with life music, he had amazing voice and played great songs!!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Great burger, friendly service and super cocktails. Definitely feels uptown - both in style and price, but it's worth it and fits nicely in the neighborhood.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Service was good but the food was meh. I never tried their famous steak but I couldn't bring myself to with the dark cow wallpaper staring at me..

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Friendly (Italian) staff en quick service. Good capuchino

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: I planned to invite my friend there.  He is using a wheelchair, and there is no table suited for him..  all the tables on the main level are bar high, and to get to "normal" table will be impossible for him, as there are 3 big steps to climb..  too bad :(

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: steak was very nice with rich smoky taste! service was good as well :)

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Great service, great food and very nice location

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: I can not emphasise how much I love the burger at this place.  Go for the burger. Go now. Don't waste your time reading any further. GO GO GO.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Non friendly service, Cesar salad was good taste but too small for the price, sandwich nothing special, you can prepare a better and real one at home

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The food was good and the restaurant itself is nice, but service was bad. I was one of three parties in the whole place and they forgot my appetizer!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Good food, good drinks and good service. Enjoyed a nice late (after museum) evening at this little cozy place.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Friendly staff, good service, food served quickly and was very nice. Reasonably priced. Recommended!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: My steak was broiled to perfection. Wait staff was excellent. Most enjoyable.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The food was not Incredible, the ribs weren't tasty and the portion was little. It's too expensive for what is it and the staff is not friendly.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Honestly up there with one of the best beef burgers I've ever had! Highly recommend this place!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: The Short Ribs are very good! The meat is very tender and tasty. It is not cheap, as other restaurants in the area.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: overpriced, disinterested service, reasonable quality meat with quantities obviously less than stated on the menu. Quick and easy food for people with too much money

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Overpriced. I am always down to pay, but this place tourist trap they offer steak pure meat and you have to order side separately.

Review Text: Good food but really - Ladies and Men steaks ?!?! Should people choose their steak base on gender in 2017 or based on their hunger ?!?! Is everyone welcome here ??!!

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Excellent burger cannot fault it whatsoever, however prices are pretty steep for 2 burgers a bottle of water and half pint beer

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: We are New Zealand meat snobs.  The hamburger was perhaps the best I‚Äôve had in years and we would come back here.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: Lovely ambiance and warm genuine reception. Food was up to expectation. Beth cozy spot.

Name: The uptown meat club
Review Text: My wife and I went in for a late lunch. Food was excellent and service was exceptional.  Fantastic!
